author: Bethany Biron
title: Hobby Lobby is closing all locations and furloughing 'nearly all' store employees without pay after it defied stay-at-home orders by quietly reopening locations around the nation
description: Hobby Lobby is closing all of its stores nationwide and furloughing most of its employees without pay, according to a statement shared on the company's website Friday afternoon. Beginning April 3, Hobby Lobby is "ending emergency leave pay and suspending use …
content:
After quietly reopening stores across the country in defiance of coronavirus-related state lockdown orders, Hobby Lobby is closing all stores nationally and furloughing employees without pay.
